mapper.select: select uno, uname, sex, mail, pwd, uphon, upath, utype, trnno, trnint, trncar, trntime, trnacnt, trnprog, trnbank, trncoin from TRN t inner join USER u on u.uno = t.trnno order by uno asc
mapper.insert: insert into TRN(trnno, trnint, trncar, trntime, trnacnt, trnbank, trncoin) values(#{userNo},#{introduce},#{career},#{time},#{account},#{bank}, #{coin})
mapper.select: select uno, uname, sex, mail, pwd, uphon, upath, utype from USER where uno=#{value}
select uno, uname, sex, mail, pwd, uphon, upath, utype from USER where mail=#{value}
select uno, uname, sex, mail, pwd, uphon, upath from USER where mail=#{id} and pwd=password(#{password})
select count(*) from USER where mail=#{id} and pwd=password(#{password})
mapper.update: update USER set uname=#{name}, sex=#{sex}, mail=#{id}, pwd=password(#{password}), uphon=#{trainerPhone}, upath=#{trainerPath}, utype=#{trainerType} where uno=#{trainerNo}
